developerIdentity-osx.description: The signing identity used when code-signing for macOS. Mandatory for Mac installers.

iconPath.description: Very optional path to an icon file, to be used for macOS bundles. Not sure if working.

installerPNGPath.description: The .png background path used for Mac installers. Optional.

hasGUI.description: true if the plug-in has a GUI. Can be used to disabled the UI of a plug-in.

isSynth.description: true if the plug-in is an instrument. Must match with the choosen category property.

licensePath.description: Optional path to a license file, to be bundled with binary releases.

pluginName.description: Full name of the plug-in vendor.

pluginUniqueID.description: A four char code identifying your plug-in in the VST2 namespace. Nobody knows which one are available or not. When breaking save compatibility, you MUST issue a new plugin ID.

publicVersion.description: Public version of the plug-in, of the form major.minor.patch. The implicit meaning is that save compatibility is broken only for major versions.

receivesMIDI.description: true if the plug-in reads MIDI input, can be for a synthesizer or an effect taking MIDI.

userManualPath.description: Optional path to a user manual file, to be bundled with binary releases.

vendorName.description: The full name of the plug-in vendor.

vendorUniqueID.description: A four char code for the plug-in vendor.

category.description: The category of the plug-in. Helps to be listed more prominently in a DAW.
